name.description: The display name of the Axon Ivy task. This is a human-readable title that summarizes the task purpose.

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the task is about, including relevant context or objectives.

responsible.description: The username or identifier of the person currently responsible for performing or managing the task.

customFields.description: Custom key-value pairs containing additional task metadata. The key is the field name, and the value is its content. Represented as Map<String, String> in Java.
